apple_vendor_description: This tender emoji, depicting a kiss between a woman and a man with medium and medium-light skin tones respectively, is beautifully rendered on Apple devices with a focus on soft, romantic lighting. Their faces are brought close together, with gentle curves and smooth gradients emphasizing the intimacy of the moment, showcasing Apple's characteristic attention to emotional nuance. The subtle blush on their cheeks and the soft sheen on their lips are hallmarks of Apple's glossy 3D shading, making this emoji a perfect symbol of affection and romantic connection.
